name: Cocodrilo Waton
description:
English:

Crocodilo Waton is a 2D platform videogame with a side-scrolling camera and a little touch of Metroidvania.

In this videogame you control a little crocodile, whose objective is to collect the little hams scattered throughout the different levels, avoiding enemies and making his way through the many obstacles. Throughout his adventure, he will gain new abilities that will allow him to continue advancing through areas that he couldn't reach before or that were impossible to cross.

Base controls:

A/D or side arrows --> Movement

W or up arrow --> Jump

S or down arrow --> Look down

E -->  Flamethrower

Power ups controls:

W or up arrow --> Jump one time in the air

Left shift --> Dash

Q --> Fireball

Space --> Grap to roots

Creators:

Programmer --> Kevsword

Artist --> Hibernau

Español:

Cocodrilo Waton es un videojuego de plataformas 2D con cámara de desplazamiento lateral y un pequeño toque de Metroidvania.

En  este videojuego controlas a un pequeño cocodrilo, cuyo objetivo es recoger los jamoncitos repartidos por los diferentes niveles, evitando a los enemigos y abriéndose paso entre los múltiples obstáculos. A lo largo de su aventura conseguirá nuevas habilidades que le permitirán seguir avanzando por zonas en las que antes no podía llegar o le eran imposible de atravesar.

Creadores:

Programación --> Kevsword

Arte --> Hibernau
